Package simu.model

Class Palvelupiste

java.lang.Object
simu.model.Palvelupiste
Direct Known Subclasses:
CheckIn, Portti, SelfCheckIn, Turvatarkastus
public abstract class Palvelupiste extends Object

A class representing a service point in the simulation model.

Each service point has a queue and the ability to service customers that are in the queue.
